vista.graph
Class Animator

java.lang.Object
  vista.graph.Animator
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class Animator
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

This class handles the animation. Animation is controlled in the run method of this class and a thread object is used to run that method. Objects that need to be animated every frame register themselves with the Animator which then uses the observer pattern to notify them at the appropriate time.

Constructor Summary
Animator()
          Initializes the observer

          adds display

 void setInterval(long d)
          sets the interval or interval between animation frames
 void startAnimation()
          creates a thread and starts animation.
 void stopAnimation()
          stops animation by setting thread to null
